comments:
Build 20030716

While synchronizing a project, an error dialog poped up indicating that an 
internal error occured and the following NPE was in the log. The sync view was 
empty after that (not sure if it was because there was no incoming changes or 
because of the NPE)

Did you happen to switch sync view layouts? For example from tree mode to table
mode? Was the sync view open before running the action?

No, I didn't switch sync view layouts. I just had restarted my 20030715 
workspace with build I20030716. The view existed, but it was stacked under the 
package explorer view. I started the synchronize operation from the package 
explorer. This brought the sync view to the front.
Fix released to HEAD. The content provider did not need a handle to the viewer.
